籤詩版本二:
Hamba uqonde ebhilidini eliphindwe kabili ukuze ucashe, uzungezwe ihlathi elinameva
U-Tian Gaojun unempilo ende nempilo emfushane. Thola impumelelo eyodwa futhi ulahlekelwe abantu ababili. Hamba →.
詩意:
Le hexagram iwuphawu lokugcina izinto ezindala futhi zishintsha noma nini.
Konke kuzoba kuhle uma isikhathi sifika.
解曰: Njengokuphuza utshwala. Vele ubambe ongezansi. Linda kuze kufike isikhathi. Akukho nhlekelele, akukho cala.
籤詩故事一:
◇Zhang Liangyin Mountain
Ebukhosini bakwaHan, uZhang Liang, ogama lakhe lokuhlonipha kwakunguZifang, wayengumKorea.Okhokho bakhe ezizukulwaneni ezinhlanu bonke babengondunankulu baseKorea.
Ngenkathi uMbuso WaseQin ubhubhisa iNingizimu Korea, uZhang Liang wahlakaza yonke ingcebo yakhe wacasha.Efuna ukuphindiselela iNingizimu Korea, wathumela indoda enamandla eyayinekhoni yensimbi emzimbeni wayo. Ehlasela u-Qin Shihuang e-Bolangsha (manje osesifundeni sase-Yuanyang, eSifundazweni sase-Henan), washayisa isekela lemoto ngephutha. UMbusi Wokuqala wayefuna ukubopha uZhang Liang ezweni lonke, kodwa akakwazanga ukumbamba izinyanga eziyishumi.
Kamuva, u-Zhang Liang wasiza inkosi yase-Han ukuhlanganisa umhlaba. Ngemva kokuphumelela kwakhe, wenqaba ukuklonyeliswa nokuqokwa njengesikhulu, futhi ecasha ngokuthi ufunda ubuTao kuChisongzi (ongafi).
聖意: Thandazela izibusiso ekhaya kanye nokuphepha kwakho (inhlanhla evilaphayo ingachazwa kuphela ngokuphana) Ukufuna ingcebo kuyinto evamile (gwema) Ukuthengiselana kuzophumelela (ima kancane) Umshado awuhambisani noLiujia, inhlanhla lapho uhamba ukuya insimu, izikelemu ziyingozi, izilwane eziyisithupha ziyachuma (ukwehluleka), ukufuna abantu, ukuvimbela amacala omphakathi, ukulahlekelwa, ukufuduka kuyinhlanhla (ishwa) ) Ukulahlekelwa impahla, ishwa lokugula, thandazela inhlanhla ezintabeni nasemathuneni.
